rows.label: qev025203_MSG0034
rows.name:
Anyone in the government will know what I'm going
through here. Hopefully you can go get a decision from
them soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh, hi! So did you get a ruling?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0002
rows.name:
...Whaaat?! So just because "society has decided" or
whatever, my personal trauma doesn't matter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0003
rows.name:
That's insane! And I'm not about to quietly suffer just
because it's politically expedient for them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0004
rows.name:
It'd be one thing if I actually thought most people really
wanted to be friends with the Ma-non, but they don't![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0005
rows.name: So I don't see why I should have to play along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0006
rows.name:
Go on, ask around. Everyone will tell you what a
stinking, greedy, shifty, no-good lot they are!
...No offense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0007
rows.name: Well? Go on, ask around town already.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0008
rows.name:
If everyone says we should be bending over backward
to welcome the Ma-non, then...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0009
rows.name:
Well, then I'll think about it. I'm not a racist
or anything, and I certainly don't want to be
the last holdout to a dying way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0010
rows.name:
...But I seriously doubt they'll tell you that Ma-non are
anything but a bother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well? Everybody told you there was no way they were
getting chummy with a bunch of lizard-people, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_JNK0010
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev025203_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain how most people like the Ma-non.

rows.label: qev025203_JNK0020
rows.name: Rebuke

rows.label: qev025203_SEL0021
rows.name: Chastise Alesa for speaking ill of mankind's friends.

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0012
rows.name:
R-really? That many people said the Ma-non helped
them out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0013
rows.name:
But how can you say they're our friends?
Where's your proof?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Wait, HOW many people said the Ma-non helped
them out?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0015
rows.name: ...Some even said the Ma-non saved their lives?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0016
rows.name: Oh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0017
rows.name:
W-well, if they're really that nice, then I can't let a little
trauma over the way they look hold me back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0018
rows.name: I'm not a monster, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0019
rows.name:
All right, then! From now on, Ma-non are welcome
in my store![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0020
rows.name:
...I doubt my shop could stay in the black much longer
without their business, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0021
rows.name:
It may take me a bit to stop shuddering and start
smiling, but I'll figure something out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025203_MSG0022
rows.name:
Who knows, maybe they'll become my best customers!
And even if they don't, I'll work out my issues as best I
can.[ST:wait ]
